description:
What is the course about?

This is updated as of February 17, 2015. 500+ students are already enrolled!

This course offers practical tips and advice on how to be a successful student. It provides a look at types of colleges in the US and why it is important to recognize the differences. A free downloadable e-Journal is provided for students to document their understanding of:

-What they need to know about choosing a college in the United States (for students who are thinking about studying in the US)

-What they need to know about choosing a college within the US

-What they need to know about how to get into college

-What International students need to know about pitfalls

-What they need to know about how to begin college

What kind of materials are included?

A free e-Journal for students to document their journey

Videos, presentations, scavenger hunt and quiz

How long should the course take to complete?

2 days

How is this course structured?

There are 5 quick lectures/Videos

Why take this course?

Are you confused about all of the college choices that exist today?

Do you want to learn about how to choose the best college for you?

Do you want to know how to begin your college career well?

Are you beginning college or returning to college?

Do you have kids who are going off to college?

The college journey is fraught with pit falls. Even if you or your child did exceptionally well in high school, you still need to know to Secret to College Success!

This beginning course reveals some of the secrets that you should know before embarking on such a huge endeavor and provides easy step-by-step strategies to help you navigate college so that you can accomplish your academic career goals of your dreams!

We offer a 30 day money-back guarantee, no questions asked!
title: Be a Successful College Student in the US!
